document.full_text: unrest spread in southern syria on monday with hundreds of people demonstrating against the government in three towns near the main city of deraa, but authorities did not use force to quell the latest protests.
document.title: syria protests spread, authorities pull back
lines_and_colors: unrest spread in southern syria on monday with hundreds of people demonstrating against the government in three towns near the main city of deraa, but authorities did not use force to quell the latest protests.
